CVE-2020-12646.title: Open-Xchange OX App Suite and OX Documents cross-site scripting
CVE-2020-12646.body: Open-Xchange OX App Suite and OX Documents is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of OX App Suite and OX Documents (7.8.4-rev70, 7.10.1-rev31, 7.10.2-rev26, 7.10.3-rev12 or later), available from the Open-Xchange Web site. See References.

CVE-2020-15712.title: rConfig ajaxGetFileByPath.php directory traversal
CVE-2020-15712.body: rConfig could allow a remote authenticated attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the ajaxGetFileByPath.php script containing hexadecimal encoded "dot dot" sequences (%2f..%2f) in the path parameter to view arbitrary files on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of rConfig (3.9.6 or later), available from the rConfig Web site. See References.

CVE-2020-15713.title: rConfig devices.php SQL injjection
CVE-2020-15713.body: rConfig is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the devices.php script using the sortBy parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of rConfig (3.9.6 or later), available from the rConfig Web site. See References.

CVE-2020-15714.title: rConfig devices.crud.php SQL injection
CVE-2020-15714.body: rConfig is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the devices.crud.php script using the custom_Location parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of rConfig (3.9.6 or later), available from the rConfig Web site. See References.

CVE-2020-15716.title: RosarioSIS Preferences.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2020-15716.body: RosarioSIS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Preferences.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the tab parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the RosarioSIS GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2020-15717.title: RosarioSIS Search.inc.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2020-15717.body: RosarioSIS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Search.inc.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the advanced parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the RosarioSIS GIT Repository. CVE-2020-7357.body: Cayin Content Management Server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper input validation by the NTP_Server_IP parameter in the system.cgi script. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system.No remedy available as of June 4, 2020.

CVE-2020-4262.title: IBM i2 Intelligent Analyis Platform buffer overflow
CVE-2020-4262.body: IBM i2 Intelligent Analyis Platform 9.2.1 could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175645.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6209081 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2020-4328.title: IBM Financial Transaction Manager SQL injection
CVE-2020-4328.body: IBM Financial Transaction Manager 3.2.4 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 177839.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2020-4354.title: IBM Cognos Analytics cross-site scripting
CVE-2020-4354.body: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.0 and 11.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 178506.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6451705 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2020-4524.title: IBM Jazz Foundation cross-site scripting
CVE-2020-4524.body: IBM Jazz Foundation products is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 182434.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 6408694 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2020-4702.title: IBM InfoSphere Information Server cross-site scripting
CVE-2020-4702.body: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 187187.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.
